verbose_text: Consistent with our biochemical evidence that TIFAB increases USP15 DUB activity, co-expression of TIFAB and USP15 resulted in further reduction in MDM2 K48 linked ubiquitination (XREF_FIG, lane 3 versus lane 5).
evidence: TIFAB increases USP15 DUB activity, co-expression of TIFAB and USP15 resulted in further reduction in MDM2
